creator: curtis@radsoft.com
text:
If you use form based authentication and access login.html directly, then you 
never get logged in.

What is happening is that the authentication servlet does not know which 
secure resource you are trying to access, so the forward URL is null. When it 
gets a good login, it does not know where to send the user.

I thought this was a problem with the security model, but we are not seeing 
this issue on Weblogic. It pains me so to see weblogic functioning 'better' 
than Tomcat.

Can the security servlet forward to index.html or index.jsp if the url is null?
